description:
Lina, Gourry and Amelia finally arrive in Sayloon and see the poster of "the Wanted." To their surprise, "the Wanted" are Lina and Gourry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Argent ! Écrasons les chasseurs de primes !
Banii / În căutarea vânătorilor de recompense
Money! Knock Out Those Bounty Hunters!
Money! 賞金稼ぎをブチのめせっ!!
